tasks.label: Deploy to GitHub Pages and Push
tasks.command: ./.venv/Scripts/activate; cd Notes ;mkdocs gh-deploy ;    cd ..;                    git add . ;                        git commit -m tasks_json_update;                        git push

tasks.label: Serve mkdocs
tasks.command: ./.venv/Scripts/activate; cd Notes ;mkdocs serve ;    cd ..;                    git add . ;                        git commit -m tasks_json_update;                        git push
